item.title: Gremlin add a quote by Robert J. Sawyer
item.description: "I learned that you can't choose the ways in which you'll be tested." -- Robert J. Sawyer

item.title: Gremlin add a quote by Kim Stanley Robinson
item.description: "...what has mattered are the moments of exposure to every life, when habit is no longer enough, and choices have to be made. That's when everyone becomes a great man, for a moment; and the choices made in those moments, which come all too frequently, then combine to make history." -- Kim Stanley Robinson

item.title: Gremlin add a quote by Nancy Kress
item.description: "Where did the bonds of maternity end? All children grew up, changed, became somebody else. Parents who trembled that they might lose a gap-toothed toddler to some terrible accident ended up losing him anyway, always, to time. The toddlers died, after all, and what was left was a bond with another adult, who had once been the beloved child." -- Nancy Kress

item.title: Gremlin add a quote by Carson McCullers
item.description: "Next to music, beer was best." -- Carson McCullers
